description: Thomas A Schmitz 17 Jun 2011 7 Creative Commons Who Translates and for Whom? Fourth part of the What is Translation Podcast series. In this part, the question of who is best placed to translate classic texts; academics, poets, dramatists and who is best placed to receive the translation, students, scholars or the general public 0:20:24 Oliver Taplin, Lorna Hardwick 27 Jul 2010

is_part_of.title: University of Oxford Podcasts: Faculty of Classics

title: Thomas A Schmitz
